item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JKB7NFRYS1E7AM98S78ME8M4
item.description: #Memos now has Shortcuts where you can have custom filters set up. Close to one of my wishlists for Memos, but I would have preferred a permalink for these shortcuts so I can bookmark them and easily get back to them later: www.usememos.com/âˆ #UseMemos

item.title: Mastodon/Bluesky to Memos
item.description:
Mastodon/Bluesky to Memos

A Python script that listens to your Bluesky/Mastodon posts and captures them in your Memos instance.
I’m not sure if this is something I want implemented as is, but the script could be a reference and a starting point for my future scripts.
item.content:encoded:
Mastodon/Bluesky to Memos

A Python script that listens to your Bluesky/Mastodon posts and captures them in your Memos instance.
I’m not sure if this is something I want implemented as is, but the script could be a reference and a starting point for my future scripts.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JK07EJ3C68Y1R2E4CKDH43H7
item.description: Didn’t know that #Memos by #UseMemos have a third party Android app! Now more reason for me to use it for my notes. Wish it had AI supported search, though, ala #Blinko mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid: An app to help you capture thoughts and ideas github.com/âˆ
item.content:encoded: Didn’t know that #Memos by #UseMemos have a third party Android app! Now more reason for me to use it for my notes. Wish it had AI supported search, though, ala #Blinko mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid: An app to help you capture thoughts and ideas github.com/âˆ

item.title: DumbWareio - DumbDrop: dumb file dropper
item.description:
DumbWareio - DumbDrop: dumb file dropper

A stupid simple file upload application that provides a clean, modern interface for dragging and dropping files. Built with Node.js and vanilla JavaScript.
This could be useful for our Python app, to process CSV/Excel files and send out the output probably via email. I just wish there was a way to change the name DumbDrop right at the dead center.
item.content:encoded:
DumbWareio - DumbDrop: dumb file dropper

A stupid simple file upload application that provides a clean, modern interface for dragging and dropping files. Built with Node.js and vanilla JavaScript.
This could be useful for our Python app, to process CSV/Excel files and send out the output probably via email. I just wish there was a way to change the name DumbDrop right at the dead center.

item.title: TinyAuth
item.description:
TinyAuth

The simplest way to protect your apps with a login screen. - steveiliop56/tinyauth

Another authentik and authelia alternative. Hopefully it lives up to its name - - tiny!

Update: I’ll wait for this app to mature before implementing to my services. As the note in their Github page goes:

Tinyauth is intended for homelab use and it is not made for production use cases. If you are looking for something production ready please use authentik.
item.content:encoded:
TinyAuth

The simplest way to protect your apps with a login screen. - steveiliop56/tinyauth

Another authentik and authelia alternative. Hopefully it lives up to its name - - tiny!

Update: I’ll wait for this app to mature before implementing to my services. As the note in their Github page goes:

Tinyauth is intended for homelab use and it is not made for production use cases. If you are looking for something production ready please use authentik.

item.title: Pocket ID
item.description:
Pocket ID

Pocket ID is a simple OIDC provider that allows users to authenticate with their passkeys to your services.
Authentik and authelia alternative.
item.content:encoded:
Pocket ID

Pocket ID is a simple OIDC provider that allows users to authenticate with their passkeys to your services.
Authentik and authelia alternative.
